body:
I have the same issue, too. I believe distributed batch normalization is very important for some problems like action recognition. It will be very useful if Tensorflow can provide an implementation.

[Here](https://github.com/shiyemin/shuttleNet/blob/master/train_video_classifier.py#L408-L429) is my trick for train BN on action recognition, which just rearranges the sample order so that every GPU can get reasonable mean and variance.
